📜  #OTD in 1791, the Bill of Rights was ratified, securing protections for speech, religion, due process, and more. In this short video, we explore how those amendments continue to shape American civic life today. How do you help students connect rights to responsibilities? 🔗 Lesson:  https://bit.ly/3uYGs7m  #TDiH  #BillOfRights  #CivicEducation  #AmericanHistory

On Bill of Rights Day, BRI President David Bobb joined C-SPANs Washington Journal to trace how the first ten amendments to the U. S. Constitution were ratified, why they still matter, and why civil disagreement is essential to citizenship.
